Name: Border closure 边境封闭
About the game: main content: This is an action role-playing game, you need to play Zhou Xin, secretly assign the resistance army and fight to the enemy , to explore the vast world of Bashu, to unit your forces everywhere, wandering in the geography wastelade, and pick up anything to upgrade your equipment . Game Features: Danmaku shooting and platform jumping, you must think about both. You often need to consider your firearms, line of sight, weapons collection and derivation ... World Settings: Located in a closed crystalline wall system, resources are not replenished, so the need for special supply mode Even in the closed world, the sense of struggle of mankind will not disappear, so the formation of a separatist force The protagonist Zhou Xin, a starlady of 28 Chinese horoscopes (Wei Yue Yan, the dangerous moon-swallow) , the remaining characters are designed according Chinese mythological creatures.
